casebody.data:
Thelonious Paige v. Saint Andrew’s Roman Catholic Church Corporation et al. (11830)

Dupont, C. J., Foti and Freedman, Js.

Submitted on briefs May 9 decision released May 31, 1994 *921Richard S. Bartlett filed a brief for the appellant (Turnpike Furnace Company). Vincent M. Musto filed a brief for the appellee (plaintiff). Mark R. Cramer filed a brief for the appellees (named defendant et al.). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
